long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Skip the boredom! Save time when watching YouTube videos by filtering subtitles and skipping uninteresting parts.

Subtube can translate subtitles into all commonly used languages.

Once you select a specific language, it will translate the caption and display the translated caption below along with the official one.

Functions:
ğŸŒŸ Translate subtitles into selected language
ğŸŒŸ Display bilingual subtitles
ğŸŒŸ Subtitle style is customizable
ğŸŒŸ No need to configure every time

Subtube converts YouTube subtitles into a convenient, scrollable, and searchable format. Easily dive straight into the juiciest content. Say goodbye to introductions, intermezzos and empty words. If the video contains a lot of speech, read on as the text syncs seamlessly with the flow of the video.

You can also learn English using our mobile application. It is available for free on iOS and Android:

ğŸ“± App Store - https://apps.apple.com/by/app/vocabulary-learn-words-daily/id1658981786
ğŸ“±Play Market - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.englishingames.englishcards

long.fr:
Sautez l'ennui ! Gagnez du temps en regardant des vidÃ©os YouTube en filtrant les sous-titres et en sautant les parties non intÃ©ressantes.

Subtube convertit les sous-titres YouTube en un format pratique, dÃ©roulant et recherchable. Plongez facilement dans le contenu le plus juteux. Dites adieu aux introductions, intermÃ¨des et mots vides. Si la vidÃ©o contient beaucoup de discours, continuez Ã  lire car le texte se synchronise parfaitement avec le dÃ©roulement de la vidÃ©o.
